rukus.text: Tsey khto disbelieve kynulysya v zukhvalistʹ ta porushennya
Bahato heneratsiyi pered tym, yak yim my vynyshchyly. Vony zaklykaly do dopomohu, marno
Vony dyvuvalysʹ shcho warner musyatʹ prybuty yim, z chysla yim. disbelievers skazav, charivnyk, brekhun
vin zrobyv boham u odnoho boha? Tse ye diysno nezvychayne
lidery oholosyly, "Idutʹ ta steadfastly persevere u obozhnyuyuchykh vashykh bohakh. Tse shcho bazhayetʹsya
My nikoly ne pochuly tse z relihiyi nashykh batʹka. Tse ye brekhnya
Chomu dokaz prybuv vnyz yomu, zamistʹ nas?" Diysno, vony ye doubtful Moho dokazu. Diysno, vony shche ne pokushtuvaly Miy retribution
Roblyatʹ vony volodiyutʹ skarbamy myloserdya vashoho Lorda, Mohutnʹoho, Nadavach subsydiyi
vony volodiyutʹ suverenitetom neba ta zemli, ta vse mizh nymy? Dozvolʹte yim dopomahayutʹ sebe
Zamistʹ tsʹoho, shchob ni prymushuye vony mozhutʹ ohlyad - navitʹ yakshcho vsi yikhni storony banded razom - budutʹ zavdavatysya porazky
Disbelieving pered tym, yak yim yavlyaly soboyu lyudey Noah, `aad, ta mohutni Pharaoh
Takozh, Thamoud, lyudy Doli, dwellers Lisiv (Midyan); tsey yavlyav soboyu oponentiv
Kozhnyy z nykh disbelieved kur'yery ta otzhe, Miy retribution buv nemynuchyy
